text: Joe is a disciplined developer that brings joy and energy to his team every day. When I had the privilege of having him on my team, I was impressed by his genuineness, adaptability and comprehension of web design + development. From a technical and human perspective, he is a strong asset to have on any team!

Joe is a very talented engineer, and a great coworker. He is always happy to brainstorm ideas, help with challenges, and come up with solutions to problems. He consistently has a great attitude, positive outlook, and is eager to do more. Personally, he helped me to slow down and assess problems before diving in to a solution, which caused me to think more critically about whatever was in front of me. He is a friendly person, a strong teammate, and an eager engineer, and will surely be a great asset to any team he is involved with.

Joseph was always a reliable partner in making sure our students had the support they needed throughout the bootcamp. As a course manager, I often connected with him to ensure students’ questions about the program were answered and that they were prepared for our Industry Projects. He was quick to jump in with guidance, thoughtful in his feedback, and committed to helping students feel confident in their work. His professionalism and steady presence made a big difference for both students and staff.

I had the pleasure of working alongside Joseph at BrainStation, where we co-taught in the Software Engineering bootcamps. From day one, Joseph stood out as an incredibly knowledgeable and effective educator. He has a rare ability to take complex technical concepts and break them down into clear, approachable lessons that resonate with students of all backgrounds.¶ Beyond his depth of content expertise, Joseph is a natural leader in the classroom and among peers. He fosters an environment of collaboration, support, and growth, making it easy for both students and colleagues to thrive. His communication is always clear and empathetic, ensuring that learners not only understand the material but also feel confident applying it.¶ Working with Joseph was both enjoyable and inspiring, and I would recommend him without hesitation to any team or organization seeking a skilled educator, leader, and mentor in software engineering.

I had the absolute pleasure to work with Joseph as he taught and mentored hundreds of students in their journey to advance their Software Engineering skills. He came to every single conversation with empathy, professionalism, and genuine passion.¶ Joseph is one of those colleagues who makes collaboration easy and enjoyable. He consistently went out of his way to support students, provide guidance on projects, and answer questions. His knowledge of software engineering is impressive, but what stands out is how approachable and patient he is. Students and staff alike could count on him to help get things done smoothly.¶ Joseph is a team member and colleague any team would be lucky to have!

Joe is a brilliant and creative leader who really understands how to get the best out of people. We worked together for over eight years on many projects. What really impressed me most about Joe is just how polished he is when in front of large groups of people including senior leadership. He is as cool as a cucumber. He really brings a lot of energy that is quite contagious. He is highly reliable and proficient at his many skills and knows how to lead. I highly recommend Joe if you need to get the job done! As a friend and colleague, I can attest that he is an asset to any team.

It was a pleasure being one of Joseph's SWE students. He was the main educator for my cohort. His engaging music-themed reviews and analogies kept me engaged in class. Joseph's coding demos covered the perfect amount of curriculum. The demos succinctly integrated the course's key coding concepts. ¶ One day, students requested a review session. Joseph was under the weather but, with cayenne in his coffee, he delivered. ¶ I will forever hear Joseph's voice when I use useState in React and every time I use 'dollar sign curly braces'. Thank you for being a consistent and supportive resource for our cohort.

I had the pleasure of being a student in Joseph's software engineering course, and I can confidently say that he is a dedicated and sincere instructor. Joseph goes above and beyond in his role, demonstrating a genuine willingness to engage in discussions and review content beyond the scope of his responsibilities. ¶ Joseph's openness to new ideas are truly commendable. He creates an inclusive learning environment where students feel encouraged to explore concepts deeply, even beyond what is covered in the curriculum. His approach to teaching is characterized by his enthusiasm for sharing knowledge and his genuine desire to see his students succeed. ¶ I greatly appreciate Joseph's dedication to his students' learning journey. Any student would be fortunate to have Joseph as an instructor.

I am honored to write a recommendation for Joseph, who has been an exceptional educator during my time at BrainStation. As one of the most beloved teachers among students, Joseph's dedication and passion for teaching have significantly impacted my learning journey.¶ Joseph's deep expertise in software engineering, particularly in JavaScript, HTML, SASS, BEM, React, API calls, and SQL, laid a strong foundation for my understanding of the subject. His ability to simplify complex concepts and guide us through hands-on applications was invaluable. He often went above and beyond, providing additional support and explanations after hours, ensuring that every student fully grasped the material.¶ What sets Joseph apart is his unwavering commitment to student success. He created an inclusive and supportive learning environment where we felt encouraged to explore new ideas and challenge ourselves. His dedication was evident in the extra sessions he held, addressing our concerns and helping us debug assignments. Additionally, Joseph provided tremendous support for my Master's application, I am deeply grateful.¶ Joseph's influence extended beyond the classroom. His encouragement and willingness to assist with my Master's application have been invaluable, and I sincerely appreciate his help. His support played a crucial role in advancing my career, and I am incredibly thankful for his guidance.¶ Joseph is an outstanding educator whose commitment to his students' success is truly remarkable. I highly recommend him to anyone seeking a knowledgeable and supportive mentor in software engineering.

Joseph is very positive and funny which makes it easy to stay engaged during his lectures. He's very encouraging and goes above and beyond in helping students with their questions and concerns. Not only is Joseph a great and effective instructor, but he is also incredibly personable and makes class feel like a safe space to make mistakes and learn.

Joseph brings a positive energy and a great sense of humor to each lecture that helps students to stay engaged. He gives analogies in layman's terms when teaching new topics which makes it easier to understand and remember those concepts. He is also very approachable when answering questions as he walks through the explanation step by step.
I really enjoy how Joseph makes learning fun & I'm a big fan of his Beyonce references. I also really appreciate Joseph's review sessions that he hosts during Open Studio at the end of the week!

Joseph is a very approachable instructor, very easy to work with and ask questions. Also he's great at rolling with unexpected (inevitable, even?) technical issues and using those as excellent teachable moments.
Joseph has been more than just a teacher while I've been here. He has gone above and beyond to be a support system.

I appreciate his down to earth friendly approach, which creates a welcoming and engaging environment. He is very receptive and he answers questions and reads comments in the comment section on zoom WHILE doing demo/teaching.

I really enjoyed his class and especially during the whiteboarding he was my instructor he was very patient and helpful with us and especially me when it was my turn to solve the problem, he pointed out the things that I could improve upon on, he gave good feedbacks on our strength and weaknesses which is I'm very grateful to have an instructor like him. He empowers everyone around him.
Joseph is engaging in class and incredibly fast with answering questions from the chat in real-time.
Joseph puts all the concepts as real world analogies that stay in my mind even after few lectures. His revisions are great. I am totally inspired by his way of teaching.
He mirrors the slide deck with the demo so seamlessly it reinforces everything very nicely.

Joseph is incredibly hands-on and articulate in his explanations, making concepts crystal clear. The pace at which he delivers the material is just right; it keeps everyone engaged without feeling rushed. The best thing about Joseph are his demos. He uses the demo and slide deck in parallel which is truly the best way to teach.
Joseph is amazing in answering real time chat questions while teaching. Not a single question is missed or unanswered.
Very positive and upbeat which helps keep motivation. Approachable and takes time to explain concepts using examples

Joseph is very knowledgeable and honest about how vast the SE field is and how much there is to know. He does a good job at helping set expectations and explaining things in multiple ways as some are easier to understand than others.
It was also nice that he had people share good things going on in their lives. I think he really added to our sense of community as a class.

Joseph has very strong mentoring skills. I admire his dedication to keeping the energy up every day. He is encouraging and lives through action and example. As I mentioned before he is the Yin to Kevin's Yang.
Joseph is very thoughtful in his teaching and does a good job at explaining the concepts and presenting us with the information.
The way he structures his lectures makes them easy to follow and understand.
Joseph is a great support to the class, he is an excellent educator. He goes above and beyond in the lectures and he is funny and very approachable.
Does a great job using demos to explain things. Easy to understand.
Structures his lectures very well and explains the topics really concisely.
He is very practical!

Joseph takes time out to make sure students are following and have a good understanding of the material. I appreciate that he goes out of his way to provide extra demos during Open Studio. He does a great job explaining concepts.

Joseph Young excels as an instructor. His explanation of the DOM concept was so clear that I feel like I've truly mastered it. Joseph's dedication to our success in the boot camp is evident through the extra efforts he puts into teaching. He doesn't even take a 5-minute break during lectures and is always prepared to address our doubts. His Friday review sessions are particularly beneficial and well-executed.

Joseph truly cares about his students and goes above and beyond to help us grasp concepts. He's always there to offer extra support and regularly checks in on us, demonstrating his unwavering dedication.
Joseph is a friendly calming presence in this cohort. I enjoy his lectures. They could be a tad more engaging, but I think online learning affects this. He is overall great.
Joseph is cool. Very patient when I ask for help and says funny/quirky things in class. I have no complaints!

It is very fun to be in his classes. His references and jokes are fun. Whenever he switches between the windows, there is a smiling face of his daughter- it is so calming to see it, especially when the brain is boiling from all the information and coding.

I found his lecture demos and the additional resources provided to be really helpful. I like that he goes through the content review questions at the end of lecture to check our understanding of the material that was just delivered. I really like his energy while he teaches and his Beyonce references. I think it makes the learning experience quite enjoyable.
Takes his time to give a full and detailed explanation of concept frequently with multiple examples.

I appreciate Joseph taking feedback and remembering to take breaks. sometimes there is a lot of content we've gone through and breaks really help me to not start to feel like im loosing focus.. because we cant afford to loose focus at this bootcamp pace ;) I also really appreciate Josephs ability to talk 1on1 with and how he helps find problems I'm having, give me advise and give me gentle reminders on things that may be obvious that Im missing.
He is dynamic and He usually shows good examples.
Joseph kindly reach out to me to see how everything was going. I was able to be honest and he empathized with my concerns and was able to offer some feed back and advice.
Great teacher, makes everything very easy to understand and has an approachable personality making it easier to reach out and ask for help.
He is a very fun person and knows how to keep the class engaged, is also very empathic. Great educator overall.

He does a really good job at keeping the lectures interactive. He doesn't just tell us answers, but will usually give us hints to keep us on the right track. During demos, he he encourages us to debug whenever something goes wrong.
I love the atmosphere we have with Joseph. Also he is very supportive and always tries to help solving a problem.
Joseph's enthusiasm, charisma, and willingness to help, explain things in different ways and his encouragement.
He does a really good job at keeping the class involved by having us repeat what we've learned with examples.
He is very good at keeping us engaged.

Joseph is great! He is a good educator, explains all clearly. He is always ready to help and open to communication and providing support. The learning process with him is more fun. Love the atmosphere he creates!
Very enthusiastic and wonderful energy. Very patient and understanding.
Joseph is great! Great educator! Loved his approach and the atmosphere in his lectures.
Joseph does a good job of making everyone feel welcome in class.

I really like that he uses active recall in his lessons and is more interactive when teaching. It helps me focus when I might be having a hard time. And he doesn't make you feel like curiosity or asking questions are a bad thing.

Joseph was humble and funny and honest. He is great picking up when people are struggling with certain topics, introduces levity when needed, and is very open and empathetic. You get the feeling that he really cares, and that makes it easy to both pay attention to him and to joke around with him.

Joseph shows great enthusiasm for the material and adds positive energy in class. He's very approachable and encouraging. He's also good at checking for understanding and I find it most helpful when he does ask the class to participate and call out the next step. He could do even more of that.
Always knows when to deliver a good dad joke and always give a good laugh when i deliver a bad one!
Joseph is a wonderful instructor. Joseph helps create a positive and successful atmosphere.

I highly recommend Joseph Young as an educator for the Software Engineering program at BrainStation. As Joseph's student, I found his impact on my learning journey enlightening.¶  Joseph's exceptional expertise in software engineering, particularly in JavaScript with HTML, SASS, BEM, React, API calls, and MYSQL & SQL, provided a solid foundation for my understanding of the subject matter. His ability to communicate complex concepts effectively and guide students through practical application was instrumental in my growth as a software engineer. ¶ Beyond his technical prowess, Joseph's passion for education and commitment to student success were evident in his teaching approach. He fostered an inclusive and supportive learning environment, empowering students to explore new ideas and challenge themselves. Joseph consistently went above and beyond to provide personalized support, helping us debug our assignments.¶  During our cohort, Joseph's promotion from Associate Educator to Educator was well-deserved and warmly received by the student community. He often held extra mini-lessons on Fridays during Open Studio, providing additional guidance on approaches to assignments and addressing students' concerns. Despite being American, his humorous references to British culture added a touch of camaraderie to the classroom meetings. The banter was hilarious and continued throughout the whole program. ¶ Additionally, Joseph initiated spreading good news within our student community before starting class lectures, fostering team bonding in an online cohort. ¶ In summary, Joseph Young is an exceptional educator dedicated to empowering students in software engineering. I am grateful for his impact on my educational journey and wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone seeking a supportive mentor.

Working alongside Joseph at BrainStation has been a highlight of my professional journey. ¶ Joseph brings more than just knowledge to the classroom; he brings a sense of joy and community. His approach to teaching is marked by an infectious enthusiasm and a genuine care for inclusivity, ensuring that every student feels part of the learning journey. Joseph's vibrant personality, combined with his commitment to making learning an engaging and supportive experience, truly makes him stand out. His love for Beyoncé, mirrored in his energetic teaching style, adds a unique flair to our sessions, making them not just educational but also incredibly fun. ¶ Joseph's dedication to student success and his ability to create a welcoming and lively educational environment are commendable. He is undoubtedly a valuable asset to BrainStation and an inspiration to students and colleagues alike.

Team at Fullstack Academy. I also project managed one of his group projects. Throughout the program, Joe consistently pushed for a deeper upfront understanding of all the concepts and technologies we were using. Joe continuously pushed himself to improve, and made gains by leaps and bounds. He showed a penchant for frontend technologies, and tied in his passion as a musician with various new libraries like Tone.js and Three.js to make unique and interesting projects. As a mentor, I am proud of the work and effort Joe put forward during the time I worked with him. I am very excited to see what the future has in store!
Great at answering questions and running more engaging lectures

Love the sense of humour, it makes lessons much more memorable. Love how excited he was about each lecture or assignment, it made me look forward to them more. Knows the material very well. Pleasure to have in class.
He's super cool, and I really enjoyed his lectures. During today's capstone check-in, he was incredibly attentive and helpful.
Joseph effectively communicates ideas, ensuring students understand the material clearly.
During capstone check-ins, he was incredibly attentive and helpful.

He brings a very good energy and the way he presents keeps you intrigued. Answers questions very well, and will let you know if you are off base when going through your thoughts for understanding the content.
Joseph brings great energy and humor to the classes.
Very knowledgeable and a great communicator.
I think overall, I've really enjoyed the support and guidance from my instructors at the bootcamp. I really enjoy the project based approach to the bootcamp so far.
I like his method of teaching, he explains things in steps and as simple as it can be.
He's great at giving lectures, and interacting with students.

Joseph is very compassionate and relates to a student on an individual level, especially as he comes from a similar background to us students, he really tries to come down to our level of understanding when assisting us with problems. He is also very good at debugging and helping with problems, albeit sometimes it does take a while but that just shows his dedication to getting things right.
Joseph is a great instructor.
He's very good at explaining and has very great energy when teaching
He was very helpful and clear during the lectures, providing information with proper explanations, which made the process of understanding the topic smooth and easy.
Joseph is professional in our classes yet remains friendly, warm, and is very funny. I feel Joseph's personality is part of what makes him such a great instructor.
Joseph is an engaging educator that uses relatable examples such as Beyonce and Celine Dion to make the content enjoyable. The information and presentation of information was clear and concise.
Joseph was so patient in helping with learning in the studio. He was also really funny in class, which I think everyone liked.
Lessons were not only full of knowledge, but also entertaining and easy to digest. Joseph undoubtedly has passion for teaching and programming alike.
He made the classes entertaining through small dad jokes. These small jokes or fun comments made him seem very welcoming and human, which makes it easier to ask questions in an online setting.
Joseph did a wonderful job at keeping the class engaged. He explained the fundamentals very thoroughly, and was helpful in answering our questions.
Being engaging and making the content fun. Overall a great teacher.

Joseph Young does an excellent job of explaining concepts clearly and engaging the class. He creates a positive and fun environment that makes learning enjoyable and keeps everyone interested. His sense of humor adds a great dynamic to the lessons
Joseph does a great job explaining concepts, providing examples and answering questions. Plus, his energy makes lectures enjoyable.
Joseph does an amazing job of keeping students engaged and injecting his personality into his lectures.

From the beginning, Joseph was relatable with his background outside the tech industry. Having him as an educator at the beginning was motivating and showed me that it was possible. His lectures were engaging and funny with content that was easy to digest.
